summary: A gunrunner loses his cargo near a small coastal Sudanese town so he's stuck there. When a woman hires him to raid a sunken ship in the shark-infested waters, he sees a chance to compensate for his losses. He's not the only one.
cast: Burt Reynolds|Arthur Kennedy|Barry Sullivan|Silvia Pinal|Francisco Reiguera|Enrique Lucero|Manuel Alvarado|Carlos Barry|José Chávez|Jose Marco|Emilia Stuart
title: Arma de dos filos
